data.actual_result: You can only see half of it
data.expected_result: You will be able to see the full message bar
data.short_description: when calling someone on iPhone or using your maps to go somewhere the Apple word suggestion covers the typing area
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a chat - Click “Message #<channel> - exit out of discord - go to Apple maps - search a random location - get directions to the location - go back into discord - go back to maps and end the route - come back to discord
